items.content_html: Ping pong, also known as table tennis, is a game that involves two or four players. The objective of the game is to hit a lightweight ball back and forth across a table using small solid rackets, commonly referred to as paddles.

It allows users to initiate real-time video calls directly from their web browsers, enabling seamless communication and collaboration between individuals or groups.
